isys::IDateTime Class Reference
Defines access to operating system dependent implementation

Interface for date and time representation. More...

#include <IDateTime.h>

typedef char TimeSeparator [4]
 Separator token for the Date/Time string conversion given in the form: YEAR TimeSeparator[0] MONTH TimeSeparator[0] DAY TimeSeparator[1] HOUR TimeSeparator[2] MINUTE TimeSeparator[2] SECOND TimeSeparator[3] MILLISECOND.

Member Data Documentation

const TimeSeparator isys::IDateTime::TS_FILENAME [static]

Separator tokens for string representation of a date/time object, which is valid as a name for a file system item.

TS_FILENAME = {'-',' ','.','.'}

Definition at line 41 of file IDateTime.h.

const TimeSeparator isys::IDateTime::TS_ISO [static]

Separator tokens for ISO string representation of a date/time object.

TS_ISO = {'-',' ',':', '.'}, for example: 2010-01-01 12:30:05.45

Definition at line 35 of file IDateTime.h.
